column5: So I have to bring my boat in for it's 20 hour service Saturday am to hastings marine but don't want to miss a day duck hunting.  So I'm looking for somebody tag along on a afternoon/evening duck hunt that knows the birds on Rice. I've never hunted rice and haven't been there in a very very long time.  I got everything 3 dozen mallards, 6 dekota geese, 18' Lund Alaskan , avery quick set blind, dog etc. No where the ducks are LETS GO!
PM SINKER......he's the guy you're looking for....
Done! Man.. I would have thought people would jump at a free hunt (AS LONG AS YOU KNOW THE LAKE LOL!)
Wow no takers, on a free hunt.. I'm surprised LOL!
I would if I had equipment, was allowed and knew the lake...
